title: Panel
marks: Inscription and Tag URC on back, in black: [P.H.]
description: light tan ground; resist dyed; battle scene with red-skinned figures--some with black tails--and dark-skinned demon-like figures with red heads; severed limbs, torsos, heads and decapitated animals; large multi-headed and multi-armed figure with a large drawn bow, accompanied by a large figure with a club, right of center, facing off a pair of large men with bows and quivers, accompanied by several smaller figures with black tails
